title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Payment
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Payment 

Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 24 August 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (payment services) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 24 august 2021

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. Regulation 86 of the European Union (Payment Services) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 86 of the European Union (Payment Services) Regulations 
2018 (S.I. No. 6 of 2018) is amended in paragraph (6) by the substitution of the 
following subparagraph for subparagraph (b): 

“(b) those payment services to which Regulation (EU) 
No. 2021/1230 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 14 July 20213 applies.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 August, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L337, 23.12.2015, p. 35 
2 OJ No. L274, 30.07.2021, p. 20 
3 OJ NO. L274, 30.07.2021, p. 20 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [418] 3
